title: View Group By
description: Grouping configuration for organizing records by field values

field.description: Name of the field to group records by

x-specs.given: a view grouped by status field
x-specs.then: records should be organized into groups by status values

x-specs.given: a view grouped by field with ascending direction
x-specs.then: groups should be ordered alphabetically/numerically from lowest to highest

x-specs.given: a view grouped by field with descending direction
x-specs.then: groups should be ordered from highest to lowest
